subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The European Tour will require its members to play in at least 12 events next year, increasing the minimum by one event as more players contemplate whether to join the tour for the $10 million Race to Dubai.
snippet: The European Tour will require its members to play in at least 12 events next year, increasing the minimum by one event as more players contemplate whether to join the tour for the $10 million Race to Dubai.
